revision.comment: Promoting 'Battle of San Patricio' to Featured Article status

== Background section sentence ==
{{u|Karanacs}}, the sentence "In October, Texians, English-speaking settlers in the Mexican border region of Texas, took up arms in what became known as the Texas Revolution." maybe could be tweaked. It wasn't just the English-speaking settlers in the border areas, because the extended (Victoria area) De Leon clan was aligned with Stephen F. Austin and others. I know [[José María Jesús Carbajal]] signed the [[Goliad Declaration of Independence]] as M. Carbajal. According to the [https://books.google.com/books?id=uYW2AgAAQBAJ&pg=PA119&dq=goliad+placidio+benavides&hl=en&sa=X&ei=qa0EVfeoFYnwoASf74D4Aw&ved=0CF4Q6AEwCQ#v=onepage&q=goliad%20placidio%20benavides&f=false Poyo book] ''Tejano Journey'', [[Plácido Benavides]] had a company of 30 border area Tejanos at the Oct 1835 [[Battle of Goliad]]. [[User:Maile66|— Maile ]] ([[User talk:Maile66|talk]]) 21:56, 14 March 2015 (UTC) :Good point. In October, it was just the Anglos. It spread after that. I'll fix this later this week. (Thanks for the map change too.) [[User:Karanacs|Karanacs]] ([[User talk:Karanacs|talk]]) 20:51, 15 March 2015 (UTC)
